It's a boy! Again!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2004 Topics (Year of the Venture): It's a boy! Again!
By Kurasu Soratobu on Saturday, April 3, 2004 - 06:45 pm:

Well, been working on those RL breeding experiments, and I think I'm starting to get the hang of them. ;) Anyhow, on April 1st, at 1:14 PM, the boy known as Samuel Timmon was born. He weighed 8 pounds 6oz, and was a hefty 21.5 inches long.

As for me? I'm sore, tired, stiff, and ready to get some sleep after 48 hours in the hospital.

*zzzzzzz**snnnk!*
